## ABSTRACT

To examine the association between the use of right heart catheterization (RHC) during the first 24 hours of care ....

## SUBJECTS

A total of `r nrow(rhc)` critically ill adult patients receiving care in an ICU for 1 of 9 prespecified disease categories.

##RESULTS

By case-matching analysis ...

```{r}
tbl1 <- summaryM(
  sex + age + edu ~ swang1, 
  data = rhc,
  overall = TRUE
)
tbl1 <- summaryM_to_df(tbl1, exclude1 = FALSE, digits = 2, long = TRUE)
kable(tbl1)
```
